22.name: Scepter Master
22.description: Nothing weaves a web of magic like a fine scepter.
22.requirement: Deliver  killing blows with a scepter.

72.name: Family Reunion
72.description: You dealt with your past, and now you may join the world moving forward.
72.requirement: Complete the human personal story step "Ashes of the Past," "Liberation," or "The Ringmaster."

122.name: Dungeon Master
122.description: Mastering the deepest secrets of the darkest corners.

253.name: Reaper
253.description: Enemies lose all hope when they see you.

350.name: Ship of Sorrows
350.requirement: Seek lost riches off Orr's shores.

396.name: Hop, Skip, and Jump
396.description: It's all fun and games until someone falls.
396.requirement: You've made it all the way through the Uncategorized fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists without falling to your death.

398.name: Flawless Fins Foil Foes
398.requirement: As a dolphin, you evaded capture by the krait while swimming through the Aquatic Ruins fractal.

544.name: Hero's Aid
544.description: You bravely assisted Rox and Braham, two burgeoning heroes of Tyria.
544.requirement: Successfully complete all of the Rox and Braham Living Story instances.

bits.text: Braham's meeting with Rytlock Brimstone
Braham's meeting with Knut Whitebear
Braham's defense of Cragstead
Rox's meeting with Rytlock Brimstone
Rox's defense of North Nolan Hatchery

675.name: Troll Cache
675.requirement: Loot the Aetherblade Cache in Sector Zuhl in Timberline Falls.

681.name: Questions for Mai
681.requirement: Ask Kiel about Mai Trin's interrogation.

727.name: One Drink Left
727.requirement: Defeat your opponent while being one drink away from losing.

784.name: Queen's Gauntlet Challenger
784.requirement: Defeat a boss in the Queen's Gauntlet.

788.name: Rata Sum Exemplary
788.requirement: Represent Rata Sum in the Crown Pavilion. Escort asuran emissaries to hot-air balloons.

940.name: Grandmaster Armorsmith
940.requirement: Reach rating  in the armorsmithing discipline.

953.name: Wisdom or Woodlands
953.requirement: Complete either an Honor of the Waves or Twilight Arbor dungeon (story or explorable).

1005.name: You, Back in the Box
1005.requirement: Help Tassi reseal the reliquary. Side effects might include stickiness.

1017.name: Candy-Corn Crusher
1017.requirement: Defeat the Grand High Viscount of Candy Corn in Mad King's Maze.

1287.name: Wintersday Snowball Slinger IV
1287.description: Give players a cold welcome with a snowball.
1287.requirement: Hit  players with snowballs during Wintersday.

1326.name: Boss Thumper X
1326.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1523.name: Molten Meltdown
1523.requirement: Kill Molten Alliance in Lion's Arch.

1533.name: Pile of Parts
1533.requirement: Participate in an assault knight event.

1661.name: On Swift Wings
1661.requirement: Find and rescue all survivors in the area around Concordia.

1717.name: Hylek Historian
1717.requirement: Unlock all of the hylek weapons in your wardrobe, and collect a Hylek Tongue.
1717.locked_text: Loot a Hylek Tongue from hylek throughout Tyria.

1768.name: Containment
1768.requirement: You stood by Tassi's side as she tried to contain the reliquary.

1776.name: Upset Stomach
1776.requirement: Give the Bloody Prince a disgusting welcome during the final battle.

1809.name: Defender: Blue Oasis
1809.requirement: Successfully defend Blue Oasis from the Mordrem after the Pact forces holding the fort have achieved level 3 defenses.

1829.name: Wicked Rodeo
1829.requirement: Complete "No Refuge" after speaking with the challenge mote to activate challenge mode.

1840.name: Wizard's Vault: Daily Completionist
1840.requirement: Claim the Wizard's Vault daily meta reward.

1933.name: Daily Great Jungle Wurm
1933.requirement: Defeat the Great Jungle Wurm in Wychmire Swamp of Caledon Forest.

1957.name: Daily Lornar's Pass Event Completer
1957.requirement: Complete events in Lornar's Pass in the Shiverpeak Mountains.

1965.name: Daily Kessex Hills Event Completer
1965.requirement: Complete events in Kessex Hills in Kryta.

1977.name: Daily Orr Miner
1977.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
1977.requirement: Gather raw materials by mining ore in the following Orr maps: Straits of Devastation, Malchor's Leap, and Cursed Shore.

1979.name: Daily Maguuma Wastes Lumberer
1979.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
1979.requirement: Gather raw materials by harvesting trees in the following Maguuma Wastes maps: Dry Top and the Silverwastes.

1989.name: Daily Fractal
1989.requirement: Complete  fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

1990.name: Daily Scale 31–40 Fractal
1990.requirement: Complete a set of four fractals on a single difficulty level between 31 and 40 inside the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2036.name: Donation Defender
2036.requirement: Successfully escort  Ho-Ho-Tron's dolyak to the gate in Divinity's Reach.

2055.name: It's All About Timing
2055.requirement: Complete the three trials for the torch of divine fire in eight minutes or less.

2123.name: Scientific Weapon Collection
2123.requirement: Unlock all  Scientific weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2169.name: Crimson Wurmslayer
2169.requirement: Kill the crimson head of the great jungle wurm in Bloodtide Coast.

2175.name: Dragon Bombardier
2175.description: That should shut that mouth for now.
2175.requirement: Grab an unstable mortar shell from a crashed chopper and drop it on the Mouth of Mordremoth.

2253.name: Sunrise I: The Experimental Daysword
2253.description: Tyria is a land filled with peoples worth protecting. Defend the innocent, rescue the threatened, and consider your role as a hero in order to take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor Dawn.
2253.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Help the charr reclaim their homeland in the Urban Battleground Fractal.
Loot from the chest after defeating Tequatl the Sunless.
Save the captives from sacrifice and defeat the grawl shaman in the Volcanic Fractal.
Free captives from their imprisonment by bandits or centaurs in Harathi Hinterlands.
Defend (or free) the quaggans of Soggorsort from krait slavers in Caledon Forest.
Free the quaggan hatchlings imprisoned by the krait in Viathan Lake at the heart of Kessex Hills.
Defend (or free) the skritt from enslavement from the Nightmare Court at Zinder Slope in Brisban Wildlands.
Rescue the captive Zephyrites from the Inquest in Dry Top.
Defend (or free) the villagers of Halkor Meadows from harpy captivity in Fields of Ruin.
Help the hylek defend the Zintl Holy Grounds in Sparkfly Fen.
Help defend the Steeleye Span when it is being attacked by branded creatures.
Defend Lornar's Pass from an insurgence of steam creatures.
Defeat the Shadow Behemoth as he attempts to cross over from the Underworld.
Help aid the dredge rebellion in Frostgorge Sound.
Help defend the settlements on Southsun Cove by defeating the Karka Queen.

2265.name: Dragon's Stand Overviewer
2265.description: You've found the safest view of Mordremoth's domain.
2265.requirement: Use advanced gliding to reach the farthest overlook of Mordremoth's domain.

2351.name: Ad Infinitum I: Finite Result
2351.description: Unlock all 11 fractal components to work towards building the legendary fractal backpack.
2351.locked_text: Talk to Kelvei in the Fractals of the Mists.

2380.name: Tangled Depths Insight: Terraced Hive
2380.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Tangled Depths.

2393.name: Frostfang III: Tooth of Frostfang
2393.description: Within the halls of the norn hang the Fang of the Serpent, a fragment of the great ice Elder Dragon. Frostfang was the greatest of Jormag's champions, and Asgeir Dragonrender slayed Frostfang with but a single blow. Channel this power over ice into your efforts to create the legendary precursor Tooth of Frostfang.

bits.text: Purchase the recipe for this jar from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect and freeze water taken from the oasis in Dry Top.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect and freeze water from the Cluster of Waves in Dierdre's Steps in Mount Maelstrom.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect and freeze water taken from the Infinite Coil Reactor.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect and freeze water taken from the waterfall near the Ogham Wilds in Caledon Forest.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect and freeze water from the Ancient Cave Spring in Gendarran Fields.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect and freeze water boiled by the lava flows in Fireheart Rise.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect and freeze water taken from the waterfall near Orvar's Glen in Sparkfly Fen.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect and freeze water taken from the waterfall near Bramble Pass in Straits of Devastation.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect and freeze water taken from the Hope Falls in Malchor's Leap.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect and freeze water cascading down from the mineral pools of Southsun Cove.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect and freeze water taken from the waterfall in the Cereboth Canyon in Kessex Hills.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect and freeze water taken from the Gotala Cascade in Brisban Wildlands.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect and freeze Water taken from the Fellmyst Falls in Iron Marches.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect ice shavings from the Icebound Plunge waterfall in Lornar's Pass.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect ice shavings from the Frostgate Falls in Lornar's Pass.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect translucent ice crystals from the cave in the Darkhoof Heights in Snowden Drifts.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect residue from the defeated Ice Elemental summoned by the Svanir Shaman at the Heart of Corruption in Wayfarer Foothills.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect ice shavings from a lodge in the Barrowstead region of Frostgorge Sound.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect ice shavings from Blue Ice Station of Groznev Delve in Frostgorge Sound.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect ice shavings from the Talecrafting Steading in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect ice shavings from the large pillar of ice found in the Tribulation Caverns in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect ice shavings from the freezing cavern of Sector Zuhl in Timberline Falls.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect ice shavings from the ice pillar at end of the Underground Facility Fractal.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect ice from the Elemental Source in the Snowblind Fractal.
Collect a living ice fragment from an Ice Elemental in Wayfarer Foothills.
Collect a living ice fragment from an Ice Elemental in Snowden Drifts.
Collect a living ice fragment from an Ice Elemental in Lornar's Pass.
Collect a living ice fragment from an Ice Elemental in Timberline Falls.
Collect a living ice fragment from an Ice Elemental in Frostgorge Sound.
Collect a living ice fragment from an Ice Elemental in Fireheart Rise.
Collect a living ice fragment from an Ice Elemental in Gendarran Fields.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2394.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 42
2394.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2397.name: Heart of Thorns Act IV Mastery
2397.requirement: Complete all  Heart of Thorns Act IV achievements.

2401.name: Sum Viewer
2401.description: I can see my college from here!
2401.requirement: Catch a glimpse of Rata Sum in the distance.

2417.name: Droppin' Bombs
2417.description: You showed that ugly octovine who's boss when you dropped bombs all over it.
2417.requirement: Participate in the assault on the eastern octovine during the Battle in Tarir.

2448.name: Master Tempest
2448.requirement: Completely train the elementalist's Tempest elite specialization.

2457.name: Tangled Depths Insight: Nuhoch Lane
2457.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Tangled Depths.

2561.name: Daily Revenant or Engineer Winner
2561.requirement: Win  PvP match as a revenant or engineer.

2571.name: Astralaria I: The Device
2571.description: The saying goes—the history of Tyria is written in the stars, and indeed the tales of the past and hints of the future are inscribed in the heavens. Help Ogden Stonehealer in revealing and gathering ancient knowledge in your quest to create the Device, the first of the precursors to the legendary axe Astralaria.
2571.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Found in the chest at the end of the Buried Archives jumping puzzle in Cursed Shore.
Discover and read "Rising Stars," the ancient jotun astronomy book in the Durmand Priory library in Lornar's Pass.
Ponder the world map on the floor of the Chamber of Ministers in Divinity's Reach.
Obtained from completing the Zinn's Prize Student achievement.
Found in the treasure room of Old Oola's Lab in the Akk Wilds of Metrica Province.
Found in an Exalted chest within the trial rooms of Tarir, the Forgotten City of Auric Basin.
Attained from the Fallen Masks adventure in the Forgotten City of Auric Basin by reaching a rank of bronze or better.
Found in the treasure-room chest within the Forsaken Halls of Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Found in the chest in the Tomb of Blackpowder within Kapellenburg in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Search Omadd's Machine within the Cavern of Shining Lights of Dry Top to find his notes.
Take a rubbing of one of the jotun runestones near Leaning Grade in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Take a rubbing of the jotun runestone in the Ghost Stones in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Take a rubbing of the jotun runestone monument near Heimdahl's Last Stand in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Take a rubbing of the ancient casket in the Azabe Qabar, Royal Tombs in Cursed Shore.
Offered for purchase by Albin Chronicler in Wayfarer Foothills after successfully helping trade with the jotun tribe.
Search the buried chests of Dry Top once they have been uncovered during a sandstorm.
Found in the Cliffside Fractal chest.
Found in the chest deep within King Jalis's Refuge in Snowden Drifts.
After completing your collection of ancient knowledge, speak with Ogden in the Durmand Priory library about your findings so that he may continue with research of his own.

2572.name: Warmaster's Pack
2572.requirement: Collect all  items to construct your Warmaster's Pack.

bits.text: Complete the Vigil's Honor collection.
Exchange Pact rations at Vigil weapon and armor merchants at the Vigil Headquarters.
Complete the Heart of Thorns Act I Mastery achievement.
Successfully complete the Auric Basin map meta-event cycle.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Defeat the Tarnished Traitor. (Requires Exalted Purification.)
Defeat Mayatl the Fierce. (Requires Itzel Leadership)
Defeat Potoni the Massive. (Requires Nuhoch Proving)
Defeat Mordremoth in Dragon's Stand.

2612.name: Auric Basin Insight: The Falls
2612.requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

2631.name: "Faren's Flyer" Strongbox
2631.requirement: Search in the canopy over the Ordnance Corps area for the strongbox from "Faren's Flyer."

2640.name: Daily Revenant or Thief Winner
2640.requirement: Win  PvP match as a revenant or thief.

2685.name: Essence Collector—Champion
2685.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension III: Monument of Legends.
2685.requirement: Purchase 1 Essence of Discipline from the League Vendor.

2697.name: League Engineer—Recruit
2697.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Professional—Recruit achievement.
2697.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches as an engineer.

2705.name: League Thief—Veteran
2705.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Veteran achievement.
2705.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches as a thief.

2717.name: League Conqueror—Veteran
2717.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension II: Tapestry of Sacrifice.

2891.name: Daily Adventure: Flying Circus
2891.requirement: Open the bronze daily reward chest from this adventure!

2905.name: Daily Adventure: Drone Race
2905.requirement: Open the bronze daily reward chest from this adventure!

2963.name: Dungeon Frequenter
2963.requirement: Complete eight dungeon paths for a grand reward!

bits.text: Crucible of Eternity Story
Crucible Explorable—Submarine Path
Crucible Explorable—Teleporter Path
Crucible Explorable—Front Door Path
Ascalonian Catacombs Story

Catacombs Explorable—Detha's Path

Arah Explorable—Forgotten Path

Manor Explorable—Butler's Path

Sorrow's Explorable—Fergg's Path
Sorrow's Explorable—Rasolov's Path
Sorrow's Explorable—Koptev's Path

Twilight Explorable—Leurent's Path
Twilight Explorable—Vevina's Path
Twilight Explorable—Aetherpath
Honor of the Waves Story
Honor Explorable—Butcher's Path
Honor Explorable—Plunderer's Path
Honor Explorable—Zealot's Path
Citadel of Flame Story
Citadel Explorable—Ferrah's Path
Citadel Explorable—Magg's Path
Citadel Explorable—Rhiannon's Path

2967.name: Daily Tier 4 Thaumanova Reactor
2967.requirement: Complete Thaumanova Reactor at fractal scale 76 or higher.

2977.name: Daily Tier 1 Cliffside
2977.requirement: Complete Cliffside at Fractal scale 1 or higher.

3023.name: Privateer Weapon Collection
3023.requirement: Unlock all  Privateer weapon skins in your wardrobe.

3031.name: Ley Line Researched
3031.requirement: Collect a Ley-Infused Lodestone from Ela Makkay.

3050.name: "Out of the Shadows" Mastery
3050.requirement: Complete all  "Out of the Shadows" achievements.

3075.name: Apprentice Kasandra's Notebook
3075.requirement: Find the scattered pages in Bloodstone Fen.

3084.name: Take It Down a Notch
3084.requirement: Defeat a White Mantle knight in celebration.

3171.name: "A Crack in the Ice" Mastery
3171.requirement: Complete all  achievements for "A Crack in the Ice."

3178.name: Gift of Aurene
3178.requirement: Collect the  parts to create an Aurene mini.

bits.text: Complete the Precocious Aurene quest.
Crafted by huntsmen.
Crafted by tailors.
Crafted by leatherworkers.
Crafted by artificers.
Crafted by jewelcrafters.
Created by combining the frame, stuffing, skin, eyes, and adornments.
Present your doll to Aurene.

3180.name: Up to the Challenge
3180.description: Bling-9009 has received reports of your exploits and now carries new weapon skins!
3180.requirement: Accept the harbinger's challenge and defeat Ensolyss in the Nightmare fractal.

3293.name: Siege Killer
3293.requirement: Defeat  player during Battle of Kyhlo rated matches.

3294.name: A Meeting of Ministers
3294.description: Journal: A Meeting of Ministers Completed
3294.requirement: Accompany Queen Jennah to her gathering of the Ministry.

3297.name: Devoted Weapon Collection
3297.requirement: Unlock all  Devoted weapon skins in your wardrobe.

3328.name: Glowing Spirit
3328.requirement: Win  rated match in Spirit Watch.

3380.name: Courtly Discourtesy
3380.description:
Story Instance: Regrouping with the Queen

"You can't play in here! This is the throne room!"
3380.requirement: Bring some life to the throne room by interacting with its denizens.

bits.text: Salute the aspiring young Shining Blade guard.
Dig for gossip with each of the ladies-in-waiting.
Make a guard laugh by misbehaving (glide, swim, pet).

3390.name: Dreams of a Thorn
3390.requirement: Locate objects of power across Tyria to aid in the restoration of Caladbolg.

3407.name: Arachnogenesis
3407.requirement: Slay the champion webby mother near Ancient Hollow.

3449.name: Daily PvP Rated Game Winner
3449.requirement: Win a rated game in PvP.

3558.name: Desolation Griffon Expert: Gold
3558.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3679.name: Won't Get Killed Again
3679.requirement: Don't get killed by Balthazar's Ultimate Attack.

3697.name: Adept Holosmith
3697.requirement: Begin training the engineer's holosmith elite specialization.

3740.name: Race to the Finish: the Desolation
3740.requirement: Finish the race around Sand Jackal Run in first, second, or third place.

3783.name: Desert Highlands Insight: Lifeblood Falls Grub Ledge
3783.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desert Highlands.

3807.name: Master Scourge
3807.requirement: Completely train the necromancer's scourge elite specialization.

3900.name: Path of Fire: Act 1 Mastery
3900.requirement: Complete all  Path of Fire: Act 1 achievements.

3935.name: Lunatic's Fashion
3935.requirement: Collect an item of each armor slot from the Lunatic set.

bits.text: Hat
Shoulders
Coat
Gloves
Pants
Boots

4032.name: That Belongs in a Museum
4032.requirement: Find all the hidden relics around Fahranur, the First City.

4043.name: (Annual) Some Disassembly Required
4043.requirement: Defeat misbehaving Wintersday toys while helping Tixx run the workshop or exploring Tyria. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4090.name: Saving Skritt
4090.requirement: Find Subject S in the poisonous corridor and evacuate him to the airship.

4360.name: Jahai Bounty Hunter
4360.description: Face the mighty nine! (Or, seven? Wait...)
4360.requirement: Complete all four bounties in Jahai Bluffs.

bits.text: Angry Pet Rock
Wyvern Matriarch, Patriarch, and Young
Badly Confused Ettin
Zommoros's Sword and Shield

4451.name: Reaper's Return
4451.requirement: Finish a game of Reaper's Rumble.

4477.name: Rolling Competitor: Ghostfire Run
4477.requirement: Complete 15 laps of the roller beetle race in Diessa Plateau. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4514.name: Chasing Tales: Man-at-Arms
4514.description: Fully equipped, Mouglon was nigh unstoppable.
4514.requirement: Defeat 60 enemies while wielding a mace and a shield in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Mouglon the Watchful.
Defeated 60 enemies while wielding a mace and a shield in Thunderhead Peaks.

4517.name: Chasing Tales: Ravenous
4517.requirement: Deliver five strikes with daggers without taking damage between strikes.

bits.text: Learned of Belitrea the Blade of Want.
Delivered five strikes with daggers without taking damage in Thunderhead Peaks.

4529.name: Chasing Tales: Shattering Storm
4529.description: There's no stage quite like a conquered battlefield.
4529.requirement: Defeat 50 Branded opponents with a greatsword in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Kobbel the Poetic.
Defeated 50 Branded with a greatsword in Thunderhead Peaks.

4656.name: Mini Skimmer Pup Collection
4656.requirement: Unlock all skimmer pup minis in your wardrobe.

4729.name: How to Feed Your Skyscale
4729.requirement: Collect / Volatile Magic while riding a skyscale in Dragonfall.

4783.name: Goddess of the Arena
4783.requirement: Finish the season in 1st place on the skill rating leaderboard.

4881.name: (Annual) Boss Blitz: Pummel Pyroxis
4881.requirement: Defeat Pyroxis during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4934.name: Daily Grothmar Ooze Pit Participant
4934.requirement: Defeat the grand champion in the Ooze Pit.

4964.name: Prolific Popper
4964.requirement: Shoot 300 targets in the target shooting event.

4989.name: Eyes for Ears
4989.requirement: Find all the listening devices hidden throughout Grothmar.

bits.text: Meet with your initial contact to start the collection.
"Remember: establish plausible deniability."
"Listen in where he keeps watch."
"Tune in for a tune up."
"Sometimes it's okay to have things confiscated..."
"Keep surveillance of her under the table."
"I'll never miss a song again."
"He seems nice, but can we really trust him?"
"What are they even researching?"
"I'd hate to have to climb all those steps just to sleep."
"Something for my ARCH-rival. Heh."
"Maybe I can catch some cooking tips?"
"Drinks and secrets are often spilled together."
"I'll cross this one when I have to."
"Right on target."
"Recruited a spy we don't need to pay or feed."

5083.name: Reel It In
5083.requirement: Earn gold participation in 20 kodan ice fishing events.

5107.name: "Shadow in the Ice" Mastery
5107.description: <c=@Flavor>As you make progress, kodan will begin to return to Still Waters Speaking.</c>

5133.name: A Hunger for Knowledge
5133.requirement: Discover  books around West Bjora Marches.

bits.text: A History of Still Waters Speaking: Part One
A History of Still Waters Speaking: Part Two
Koda's Promise, Koda's Gift
Quiet
OFFICIAL CORRESPONDENCE RE: LARANTHIR

5201.name: Dark Wing Weapon Collection
5201.requirement: Unlock all  Dark Wing weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5232.name: Visions of the Past: Antitoxin Injector
5232.description: Delve deep inside the Tower of Nightmares and set off a chain reaction that will counteract its poisonous influence over Kessex Hills. [This mission is now playable in Living World Season 1: Episode 4.]
5232.requirement: Inject  dose of antitoxin to into the heart of the tower.

5277.name: Special Mission: Swatting Mosquitos
5277.requirement: Destroy  Dominion choppers over the village, lighthouse, fortress, or port locations.
5277.locked_text: Unlock by using Flame Legion Special Mission Documents.

5322.name: Special Mission: Pillage the Village
5322.requirement: Destroy  structures at Leadfoot Village in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5444.name: Share the Burden
5444.requirement: On the Master tier, defeat the final boss without anyone receiving more than 9 stacks of Tidal Bargain. Death removes eligibility.

5667.name: Silent as Leopard, Clever as Raven
5667.requirement: Reach the magma chamber of the volcano with a minimal number of enemies slain during the Wildfire story chapter.

5717.name: Return to Trouble at Fort Salma
5717.requirement: Complete the mission Trouble at Fort Salma in Living World Season 2 Episode 2.

5752.name: Treasure Hunter: Silverwastes 2
5752.requirement: Find and open  buried bandit chest in the Silverwastes.

5763.name: Ore Miner: Bitterfrost Frontier
5763.requirement: Mine ore  times in Bitterfrost Frontier.

5852.name: Champion Deregulator
5852.requirement: Defeat the Twisted Marionette's power regulator wardens.

5880.name: Revenge of Archon Iberu
5880.requirement: Kill Archon Iberu during the raid on Palawadan.

5900.name: Return to Darkrime Delves
5900.requirement: Complete the story mission Darkrime Delves in Living World Icebrood Saga Visions of the Past: Steel and Fire.

5916.name: Course Favorite: Domain of Istan
5916.requirement: Complete any race event in the Domain of Istan.

5940.name: Return to One Charr, One Dragon, One Champion
5940.requirement: Complete the story mission One Charr, One Dragon, One Champion in Living World Icebrood Saga Episode 4.

5946.name: Gauntlet Reclaimer
5946.requirement: Complete the Gauntlet of the Khan-Ur jumping puzzle in Grothmar Valley.

6038.name: Court Duty: Untangling the Labyrinth
6038.requirement: Complete haunted door events in the Mad King's Labyrinth. Boss events award extra progress.

6068.name: Krytan Fisher
6068.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6068.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of Kryta.

6076.name: Echovald Wilds Insight: Cemetery Pond
6076.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in the Echovald Wilds.

bits.text: Scan the C.L.E.A.N. 5000 golem at the Thaumanova Reactor in Metrica Province.
Defeat the Inquest Golem Mark II at Whitland Flats in Mount Maelstrom.
Scan a deactivated DYN 4652 golem at Goldenlight Hallow in Timberline Falls.
Scan a golem memory module at the Inquest Hexfoundry G-14 in Sparkfly Fen.

6122.name: Dragon's End Insight: Warehouse
6122.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Dragon's End.

6164.name: Simpleminded
6164.requirement: Throw local treasures at naga looters 5 times.

6257.name: Derelict Temple Raptor Ride
6257.description: If your raptor isn't a strong swimmer, try navigating some low, mountainous terrain.
6257.requirement: Ride a raptor from the bell of the derelict temple to the northeastern lighthouse in under 2 minutes without dismounting or teleporting.

6272.name: Cantha Explorer
6272.description: You've explored all major areas of Cantha.

bits.text: Explore all areas in Seitung Province.
Explore all areas in New Kaineng City.
Explore all areas in the Echovald Wilds.
Explore all areas in Dragon's End.

6299.name: Little Foxes in the Big City
6299.requirement: Play with all shrine guardian infants in New Kaineng City at least once.

bits.text: Wants to visit faraway lands.
At the end of a crowded alley.
Hiding among grubs.
Lounging beneath power cables.
Enjoying upscale markets.
Admiring the sounds of the marketplace by the Kaineng Docks.
Watching over the Central Power Station.
Looking up at the empress.
Glancing at a jade phoenix.
Hiding in the northern part of the Ministry Ward.
Pretending to be an agent at a Ministry of Security precinct.
Counting large crates by the shipping docks.
Playing among salvaged goods.
Surrounded by Old Kaineng's remains.
Watching the occasional holographic whale pass by.
Overlooking the entrance to a canal.
Playing high above the towers near a shipwreck.
High above Bori Ward.
Playing between the edge of civilization and the wilds.
Enjoying the aroma of high-quality tea.
Hiding south amid the ruins of Old Kaineng.
Watching the empress's back with Xunlai.
Hiding on a rooftop garden.
Hiding from the Speakers on a roof.
High up in the ruins of Naksi Bay.
Down in the ruins of Naksi Bay.
Lounging on the shores by a lighthouse.
Near the Ministry of Archives.
Between two trees below a pool.
Admiring a massive jade monument.
This brave one runs among the Unchained Risen.
Far below a bridge in the Ministry Ward.
High above the rooftops in Grub Lane.
High above the walls of the city.
Overlooking Cobble Ward.

6355.name: Objection!
6355.requirement: Present the evidence at the ideal time.

6475.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>

6502.name: Echovald Wilds Diver
6502.requirement: Slap on your diving goggles and take a dive into the lake near Mori Village.

6518.name: Arborstone Diver
6518.requirement: Use diving goggles to jump from an ancient archway.

6531.name: Fractal Recursion: Molten Furnace
6531.requirement: Complete the Molten Furnace Fractal after completing the Flame and Frost episode.

6557.name: Patrolling the Bloodtide Beat
6557.requirement: Complete events in Bloodtide Coast to discourage unapproved piracy in the region.

6639.name: Completing Story Chapters II
6639.requirement:
Complete chapter 3 of your story.

<c=@reminder>You can select your active story and view your progress from the Story Journal menu in the Hero panel.</c>

6687.name: Spoils of Chaos
6687.requirement: Find hidden chests to aggravate the playhouse's master.

bits.text: Chest 1
Chest 2
Chest 3
Chest 4
Chest 5

6712.name: Discovering Points of Interest IV
6712.requirement:
Discover 5 points of interest in Sparkfly Fen, Mount Maelstrom, the Iron Marches, the Fireheart Rise, or Timberline Falls.

<c=@reminder>Points of interest are special locations marked by name in the world, indicated by a square icon on the map. </c>

6738.name: Decade of Battle: World vs. World
6738.requirement: Complete  events in World vs. World.

6863.name: Anguish Manifest
6863.requirement: Acquire all items to manifest an anguished weapon.
6863.locked_text: Purchase the associated Historical Weapon Diagram from Requisitions Specialists in Gyala Delve to unlock.

6979.name: Comrades in Arms
6979.description: We are never promised tomorrow, but that doesn't mean we can't fight for it today.
6979.requirement: Find the missing Astral Ward members.
6979.locked_text: Complete the story chapter Mabon's Fate to unlock this achievement.

bits.text: Talk to Hortensia in the Wizard's Tower Infirmary.
Last reported patrolling the thicket at the Bastion of Strength in Amnytas.
Last seen studying the clouds near the Bastion of the Natural in Amnytas.
Last reported defending the nexus ring at the Bastion of the Celestial in Amnytas.
Last reported investigating Kryptis activity within the Shattered Atoll in Skywatch Archipelago.
Last seen investigating Kryptis activity within the Soaring Aerie in Skywatch Archipelago.
Last seen researching relics at the Bastion of the Obscure in Amnytas.
Last seen combing Thaumaturgy Park at the Bastion of Balance in Amnytas.
Last seen patrolling the outskirts of the Medical Plaza at the Bastion of Balance in Amnytas.
Last reported seeking a mere hint of Kryptis in the Bastion of the Natural in Amnytas.
Last seen looking into Kryptis behavior on the outskirts of the Bastion of the Obscure in Amnytas.
Last seen being tended to at the Infirmary in the Bastion of the Natural in Amnytas.
Last reported looking into Kryptis rift activity in Gendarran Fields.
Last reported hunting down stolen relics in the Bastion of Knowledge.
Last reported checking in on the cellar in the Bastion of Knowledge.
Last seen assisting researchers in the Bastion of the Obscure.
Last seen investigating Kryptis influence on local wildlife at the Bastion of the Celestial in Amnytas.
Last reported defending the ritual space at the Bastion of Strength in Amnytas.
Return to Hortensia at the Wizard's Tower Infirmary.
Attend the memorial in the Wizard's Tower.

7169.name: Astral Ward Armor
7169.requirement: Purchase the Astral Ward Armor set from the Wizard's Tower Outfitter.

7176.name: Cultivate Celestial
7176.description: Waiting Sorrow looked to Dagda with sad eyes. Knowing the cosmos, a dream, but with that knowledge comes a certain...despair.
7176.requirement: Successfully complete events in the Bastion of the Celestial.

bits.text: Help Dagda get the celestial pylons operational.
Defend Dagda while she recalibrates mirrors around the Bastion of the Celestial.
Help Dagda restore functionality to the control room.

7185.name: Diving Goggles: Astral Dive
7185.requirement: Use the diving goggles to jump off the rings at Stargaze Ridge.

7194.name: Domain of Vabbi Rift Hunting
7194.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Domain of Vabbi.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

7601.name: Seitung Province Rift Hunting
7601.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Seitung Province.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

7602.name: Verdant Brink Incursions
7602.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Verdant Brink.

7617.name: WvW Rush Keep Capturer
7617.requirement: Capture a keep for your realm in World vs. World.

7650.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Thirty-Nine
7650.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Nine.

7681.name: New Kaineng City Rift Hunting
7681.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in New Kaineng City.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

7711.name: Threat of Our Presence
7711.requirement: Complete each of the 5 events in the Road to Heitor meta-event and defeat Ignaxious.

bits.text: Collect emotional residue to supercharge the southern beacon.
Carry the Beacon's Flame to light the northern beacon.
Collect emotional residue to supercharge the northern beacon.
Secure the area while Ramses and Arina bring down the barrier.
Defeat Ignaxious.

7753.name: Seeking Scarlet: Old Lion's Court (Weekly)
7753.requirement: Complete the Old Lion's Court Strike Mission, which can be accessed from Lion's Arch.

7759.name: League Slayer—3v3 Season Ten
7759.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during 3v3 Season Ten.

7795.name: Repeat Defanger
7795.requirement: Complete each of the 6 events in the Fangs That Gnash meta-event and defeat Knaebelag.

bits.text: Help Emund assault the Fortress of the Founding.
Defeat Abraxces the Scorned.
Help Frode convince frightened Kryptis to leave. Defeat any loyalists.
Defeat Valthrog the Frenzied.
Fight your way through the loyalists and reach Nyedra.
Defeat Knaebelag the Terror.

7808.name: Shrine Finder
7808.description: Unlock the boxes left by the foxes.
7808.requirement: Discover and open all the shrine guardian chests in Nyedra Surrounds in Inner Nayos.

bits.text: Sleeping under a Kryptis tent among allied supplies.
Perched atop a cliff above Eventide's March.
Near the top of a ritual tower.
On a branch near the Mastery Insight near the Coliseum of the Midnight King.
Enjoying the waterfall away from extractors.
Hanging outside a door in Nyedra.
In Stormcarved Hollows, hiding from turret fire and tentacles of Nourys among the rubble.
Above the Wailing Chasm, getting a good view of Heitor's fortress.
Near a rock and a pillar by the forward bivouac.
Hiding on top of the Fortress of the Founding.
Admiring the staircase of Eventide's March.
Overlooking where Eparch's citadel would be, but also hiding from Knaebelag.

7811.name: The Fangs That Gnash
7811.description: Splitting up, beating up, meeting up, and mopping up in Knaebelag's territory.
7811.requirement: Successfully complete each of the events in the Fangs That Gnash event chain.

bits.text: Help Emund assault the Fortress of the Founding.
Defeat Abraxces the Scorned.
Help Frode convince frightened Kryptis to leave. Defeat any loyalists.
Defeat Valthrog the Frenzied.
Fight your way through the loyalists and reach Nyedra.
Defeat Knaebelag the Terror.

7814.name: Necrotic Essence Weapon Collection
7814.requirement: Unlock all  Necrotic Essence weapon skins in your wardrobe.

7817.name: Inner Nayos Insight: Branch Vantage Point
7817.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Inner Nayos.

7821.name: Sky Scorcher
7821.requirement: Defeat 25 Kryptis in Nayos while using your skyscale.

7829.name: Legendary Relics: Components
7829.description: This collection can be a useful reference to what's needed for each gift. You may need multiples of some of these items.
7829.requirement: Gather the necessary components and gifts for making a legendary relic. The wizard smith, Lyhr, can help you craft them in the Wizard's Tower.

bits.text: Refined from 50 Vials Blood, 50 Vials of Thick Blood, 250 Vials of Potent Blood, and 100 Vials of Powerful Blood.
Refined from 50 Bones, 50 Heavy Bones, 250 Large Bones, and 100 Ancient Bones.
Refined from 50 Claws, 50 Sharp Claws, 250 Large Claws, and 100 Vicious Claws.
Refined from 50 Piles of Radiant Dust, 50 Piles of Luminous Dust, 250 Piles of Incandescent Dust, and 100 Piles of Crystalline Dust.
Refined from 50 Fangs, 50 Sharp Fangs, 250 Large Fangs, and 100 Vicious Fangs.
Refined from 50 Scales, 50 Smooth Scales, 250 Large Scales, and 100 Armored Scales.
Refined from 50 Totems, 50 Engraved Totems, 250 Intricate Totems, and 100 Elaborate Totems.
Refined from 50 Venom Sacs, 50 Full Venom Sacs, 250 Potent Venom Sacs, and 100 Powerful Venom Sacs.
Lyhr in the Wizard's Tower can also help create this.
Lyhr in the Wizard's Tower can also help create this.

Purchased from master craftspeople for research notes. 
Research notes are acquired by deconstructing crafted items with research kits.
Research kits are bought from master craftspeople.

Essence of luck can be acquired by salvaging gear of fine or masterwork quality and salvaging globs of ectoplasm. Artificers can craft essence of luck at higher quality.
Lyhr in the Wizard's Tower can also help create this.
Salvaged from certain rare or exotic gear. Lyhr in the Wizard's Tower seems to want this in large quantities.
Lucent motes are acquired by salvaging runes, sigils, and relics.
Purchased from faction provisioners.

7852.name: Inner Nayos: Stormcarved Hollows Savior
7852.description: Protecting the skies and ground from Kryptis threats.
7852.requirement: Successfully complete unique events in Stormcarved Hollows in Inner Nayos.

bits.text: Destroy the Kryptis turrets.
Protect Eppie from the tendrils of Nourys.

7894.name: Fabled Legionnaire
7894.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a warrior.

7895.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Forty-One
7895.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Forty-One.

7915.name: Legendary Legionnaire
7915.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a warrior.

8026.name: Shadow Chevalier Weapon Collection
8026.requirement: Unlock all  Shadow Chevalier weapon skins in your wardrobe.

8079.name: Far Shiverpeaks Veteran
8079.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8113.name: Sunken Treasure Hunter
8113.requirement: Use ornate rusted keys to open sunken chests across Tyria and in certain fractals.

8135.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Forty-Two
8135.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Forty-Two.

8168.name: Janthir Fisher
8168.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
8168.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways around Janthir.

8255.name: Animal Analysis
8255.requirement: Index the health of each type of local fauna for Graced by Fire.

bits.text: Fawn
Barred Owl
Rabbit
Raccoon
Raven
Frog
Crab
Janthiri Bee
Duck

8263.name: Savant of Dance
8263.description: Can you keep up with the lowlander's footwork?
8263.requirement: Successfully execute 10 perfect dances in a row in the "Dance among the kodan" event.

8292.name: Cryptid Chase
8292.description: Fables and mysteries, Janthir is filled with creatures of legend.
8292.requirement: Gather samples from across Lowland Shore.
8292.locked_text: Complete the Diplomacy and Discovery story step to unlock this achievement.

bits.text: Talk to Echoes of Night in Harvest Den.
You can hear the sounds of howling and a waterfall in Moon Camp Covert...
There are the sounds of waves at Harvest Shore...
There are the sounds of a waterfall in the Cragged Upland...
Above the sounds of a bustling village and near the sounds of falling trees in Lupine Fields.
Sometimes you can hear a haunting melody in the Haar Mire...
Return to Echoes of Night to turn in the unknown samples and learn the next step.
Hunt down a rampaging warg.
Search the Exorheic Falls for valravns.
Defeat an iboga that wanders in Bjorn Thicket.
Save the poisoned fawn in Moon Camp Covert.
Defeat the Bog Queen.
Give samples to Ward Member Eno in Moon Camp Covert.
Meet Echoes of Night and Ward Member Eno near the location of unknown track 2 to learn about what they found.
The end?

8335.name: Master Forager: Meat
8335.description: Protein plays a critical role in the lowlander diet. Have you seen Barbed Vale toss anyone yet?
8335.requirement: Turn in 100 pieces of meat as part of foraging events.

8408.name: Adventurous Spirit: Thunderhead Peaks (Weekly)
8408.requirement: Complete any adventure in Thunderhead Peaks.

8446.name: Relics—Janthir Wilds Set 2
8446.requirement: Collect  Janthir Wilds Set 2 relics by completing achievements or from the Janthir Wilds reward track.

bits.text: Complete the Janthir Wilds: Godspawn Mastery achievement.
Tier reward from the Mount Balrior: Convergence Conqueror achievement.
Purchased from unusual coin vendors in Lowland Shore and Janthir Syntri.
You can purchase this from a renown heart vendor in Festering Basin in Janthir Syntri.
You can purchase this from a renown heart vendor in Coursing Upland in Lowland Shore.
You can purchase this from Deft Lahar in Hearth's Glow.

8505.name: Klobjarne Geirr: World Boss or Meta-Event Completions
8505.description:
Meta-events can include a majority of content from past expansions or Living World episodes.

This achievement can be reset by purchasing Recollection of Bearkin's Adversaries to acquire additional copies of the reward.
8505.requirement: Complete world boss encounters or meta-events.
8505.locked_text: Purchase the item Recollection of Bearkin's Adversaries from a vendor in Maul Boneyards in Lowland Shore.

8603.name: This Bug Can Dance
8603.description: To be unsquashable requires fancy footwork.
8603.requirement: With the challenge mote active, avoid damage from Fulgent Fence, any of Decima's beam attacks targeting squad members, and Chorus of Thunder targeting anything but yourself. Then defeat Decima without dying.

8617.name: Mistburned Barrens Insight: The Laboratory Mirror
8617.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Mistburned Barrens.

8773.name: It's the Ursan Way
8773.requirement: Call on the memory of heroes long past to survive the Realm of Torment.
